title: Nickel binding enables isolation and reactivity of previously inaccessible 7-aza-2,3-indolynes | Science
content: N-Heteroaromatics are key elements of pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, and materials. N-Heteroarynes provide a scaffold to build these essential molecules but are underused because five-membered N-heteroarynes have been largely inaccessible on account of ...
